person.persName: Francis M. Searcy (Madison County, Ky, farmer)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Malinda Brooks Searcy in Madison County on February 13, 1849. Father of William A. Searcy. Married to Martha Searcy. Father of Effie Searcy and Mary Searcy. Miner in Santa Fe, New Mexico Territory, in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Madison County in 1850. Farmer in Madison County in 1860. Owned ten enslaved persons in Madison County in 1860. Accused of murdering Woods Caperton in Madison County in 1861. Farmer in Madison County in 1863.
